Mobiles.LongDescription: `hA young girl with `ibright red hair `his selling maps.``
Mobiles.Description: `hThis young girl has vivid, `ibright red hair `hand is handing out herhand-drawn maps.  She grew up studying maps with her father and enjoysmaking a living helping out the `kN`heophytes learn their way around.  ``

Mobiles.LongDescription: `hA `cTyrannobdella Rex `hleech squirms towards you agonizingly slow, its pinchers reaching for your body.``
`hA short, fluffy `dbat `hwith yoda ears twitches its head towards you.``
`nPayne`h, a smiling elf, stands here waiting to assist you.``
Mobiles.Description: Payne stands here smiling at you. He is tall and lithe with pointy little ears.

Mobiles.LongDescription: `hA `dwood-eating `nC`la`nt`lf`ni`ls`nh `hfloats in the air above your head.``

Rooms.RoomDescription: `h`g+`e============================= `kIn the Arena `e==============================`g+`hWelcome to  the newbie arena! To get  started, you  should first  buy a mapfrom the map salesman.`hType: `jlist`h - See the map?Type: `jbuy map`hNow that you've  purchased your map, you  can use it to  help you  navigatethe arena.`hType: `jread map`h.`hIn any room in this arena, you can see where you are by typing: `jlook sign`h.`h`g+`e=========================================================================`g+``

`h`g+`e====================== `kYou Are Leaving the Arena! `e=======================`g+```hYou are about to leave the Arena! Make sure you have gotten all the eq thatis offered  here, first. Type `jEQ `h to see what  you are wearing.  You shouldhave 18 items on your body.`hIf you are missing gear, it means you missed something in the arena.`hIf you are ready to move on, go `jnorth`h!`h`g+`e=========================================================================`g+``

`h`g+`e============================ `kIn The Arena `e===============================`g+`hTo attack an enemy, type  `nk <enemy name>`h. You can then loot your enemies bytyping `nget all corpse`h.`hYou can wear  anything you've  looted by  typing `nwear all`h, but the wear allcommand will not replace gear you're already wearing.`hTo replace  gear you  are  wearing, type '`nwear <itemname>`h' ie: wear candle.You can also remove gear you are wearing by typing `nremove <itemname>`h.`hIf  at any  point you get turned  around in the arena, you  can always findout where you are by typing `nlook sign`h. Don't  forget to check your map too!`hThis room: a Tyrannobdella Rex who will drop a candle.Type `jk rex`h!`h`e---------------------------------------------------------------------------``

`h`g+`e============================ `kIn The Arena `e===============================`g+`hTo attack an enemy, type  `nk <enemy name>`h. You can then loot your enemies bytyping `nget all corpse`h.`hYou can wear  anything you've  looted by  typing `nwear all`h, but the wear allcommand will not replace gear you're already wearing.`hTo replace  gear you  are  wearing, type '`nwear <itemname>`h' ie: wear candle.You can also remove gear you are wearing by typing `nremove <itemname>`h.`hIf  at any  point you get turned  around in the arena, you  can always findout where you are by typing `nlook sign`h. Don't  forget to check your map too!`hThis room: a Simpson's Toad that will drop a pair of boots.Type `jk toad`h!`h`e---------------------------------------------------------------------------``

`h`g+`e============================ `kIn The Arena `e===============================`g+`hTo attack an enemy, type  `nk <enemy name>`h. You can then loot your enemies bytyping `nget all corpse`h.`hYou can wear  anything you've  looted by  typing `nwear all`h, but the wear allcommand will not replace gear you're already wearing.`hTo replace  gear you  are  wearing, type '`nwear <itemname>`h' ie: wear candle.You can also remove gear you are wearing by typing `nremove <itemname>`h.`hIf  at any  point you get turned  around in the arena, you  can always findout where you are by typing `nlook sign`h. Don't  forget to check your map too!`hThis room: a Monkey who will drop 2 neckguards.Type `jk monkey`h!`h`e---------------------------------------------------------------------------``

`h`g+`e============================ `kIn The Arena `e===============================`g+`hTo attack an enemy, type  `nk <enemy name>`h. You can then loot your enemies bytyping `nget all corpse`h.`hYou can wear  anything you've  looted by  typing `nwear all`h, but the wear allcommand will not replace gear you're already wearing.`hTo replace  gear you  are  wearing, type '`nwear <itemname>`h' ie: wear candle.You can also remove gear you are wearing by typing `nremove <itemname>`h.`hIf  at any  point you get turned  around in the arena, you  can always findout where you are by typing `nlook sign`h. Don't  forget to check your map too!`hThis room: a Ninja Snail(?) who will drop a pair of leggings.Type `jk snail`h!`h`e---------------------------------------------------------------------------``

`h`g+`e============================ `kIn The Arena `e===============================`g+`h`hThis room is a store, much like the mapseller's room. You can type `jlist `htoview what you can buy.`hPayne is selling a steel key  which you will need to open a box! Make sure`hto `jbuy key`h.`h`e---------------------------------------------------------------------------``

`h`g+`e============================ `kIn The Arena `e===============================`g+`hThere  are two important  elements  in this room.`hThere is a box  which you  will need a key to open. The key is somewhere inthe arena, go find it!`hOnce you find the key, type `junlock box`h, then `jopen box`h, but `ibe careful`h!`hWhen you open the  box an enemey will spring  out and attack you! These arecalled aggressive mobiles, and they are rather common in the world.`h`e---------------------------------------------------------------------------``

`h`g+`e============================ `kIn The Arena `e===============================`g+`hTo attack an enemy, type  `nk <enemy name>`h. You can then loot your enemies bytyping `nget all corpse`h.`hYou can wear  anything you've  looted by  typing `nwear all`h, but the wear allcommand will not replace gear you're already wearing.`hTo replace  gear you  are  wearing, type '`nwear <itemname>`h' ie: wear candle.You can also remove gear you are wearing by typing `nremove <itemname>`h.`hIf  at any  point you get turned  around in the arena, you  can always findout where you are by typing `nlook sign`h. Don't  forget to check your map too!`hThis room: a Self-Cloning Lizzard who will drop a shield. Type `jk lizzard`h!`h`e---------------------------------------------------------------------------``

`h`g+`e============================ `kIn The Arena `e===============================`g+`hTo attack an enemy, type  `nk <enemy name>`h. You can then loot your enemies bytyping `nget all corpse`h.`hYou can wear  anything you've  looted by  typing `nwear all`h, but the wear allcommand will not replace gear you're already wearing.`hTo replace  gear you  are  wearing, type '`nwear <itemname>`h' ie: wear candle.You can also remove gear you are wearing by typing `nremove <itemname>`h.`hIf  at any  point you get turned  around in the arena, you  can always findout where you are by typing `nlook sign`h. Don't  forget to check your map too!`hThis room: a Squid Worm will drop a dark grey cloak.Type `jk worm`h!`h`e---------------------------------------------------------------------------``
